greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of prime factors of cyclotomic(n,4), which is A019322(n), the value of the n-th cyclotomic polynomial evaluated at x=4.
comment: The Mobius transform of this sequence yields A057957, number of prime factors of 4^n-1.
results.author: _T. D. Noe_, Jun 19 2003
